title: Somehow... I am one step away from honor 5
body: Won't lie, I think i am kind of toxic. But somehow im almost honor 5. Which means I am for some reason not as toxic as what the majority must deal with.

replies.body: Honors progresses are slowed if you get validly reported. Considering I play less than average number of games (and assuming you play at least the amount of games of an average player), I got to honor5 in mid August. I think your honors is progressing pretty slowly.
honors must come easy from silver 4. you know with the expectations being so little.

Loll .. honors is tied to behavior,  not skill of gameplay. 

In fact, many of the high ELO players are not that honorable. Their egos are just toooooooo huge.
when you take chat out of it its about how you play. lets just say if you play ashe support and poorly at that. people will be less likely to honor you

Who cares about getting honored. That's like the least important thing to progress honors. Let me get that team honors bonus instead, that's far more important in progressing honors.

Plus, I mainly get honors through behavior, not gameplay.
You may just be more sarcastic and not outright flamey toxic. Either way, this means that you aren't being reported that often for valid reasons. Keep up the good work!

So, in other words,

well done for not getting punished.

I am facepalming and sighing.
I'm thinking you're way more positive than you think you are. What's good is you have awareness.
